Explanation for why your app needs access to Apple Music.
Explanation for why your app needs Bluetooth access.
We need Bluetooth access to connect to nearby devices for sharing data and improving the user experience.
We need access to your calendar to schedule events and reminders within our app, ensuring you never miss an important task.
Contact access is required to simplify the process of sharing and connecting with your friends, colleagues, and other users in our app.
Always and when in use!
This app needs access to location when in the background.
The example App requires temporary access to the device's precise location.

To see maps for automatically tracked activities, allow Work Tracker to use your location all of the time.\n Work tracker collects location data to show place on a map even when the app is closed or not in use.
We require motion data access to provide enhanced fitness tracking and improve the accuracy of activity tracking.
To enable voice commands and speech recognition, we need access to your device's microphone for a more interactive user experience.
We use your data to provide personalized ads for a better experience.
LaunchScreen
Main
